Hairbrush as a bookmark: The bristles of a hairbrush can be used to hold open a book or a magazine, serving as a creative and eco-friendly alternative to traditional bookmarks.
Hairbrush as a plant pot: A hairbrush can be repurposed as a small planter for succulents or other small plants, adding a touch of greenery to any space.
Hairbrush as a candle holder: By removing the bristles and using the handle as a base, a hairbrush can be transformed into a stylish and functional candle holder.
Hairbrush as a toothbrush holder: The bristles of a hairbrush can be used to hold multiple toothbrushes upright, keeping them organized and easily accessible.
Hairbrush as a pencil sharpener: By attaching a sharpener blade to the bristles, a hairbrush can be used to sharpen pencils, providing a unique and portable sharpening tool.
